data.name: box_patch_exe
data.value: Patching .exe to support other unicode languages

data.name: box_want_login
data.value: Tired to login from the website?

data.name: check_patch_exe
data.value: Yes, I am aware of the risks and want to patch it

data.name: patcher_description
data.value:
This program comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions.
Soulworker Patcher was made to easily patch latest translations to your Soulworker Client without much risk of corrupting your original files when updating. It also can download latest translations from the SWHQ translation team and apply them at any time.

data.name: dialog_folder_change_game_dir
data.value: Select your Soulworker game client folder.

data.name: dialog_folder_change_patcher_dir
data.value: Select your new desired patcher folder.

data.name: exception_already_latest_translation
data.value: You already have the latest ({0} JST) translation files for this language!

data.name: exception_cannot_close
data.value: {0} is currently busy and cannot close.

data.name: exception_cannot_restore_file
data.value: Directory with the file "{0}" doesn't exist. Cannot restore this folder and it will be deleted.

data.name: exception_folder_not_game_folder
data.value: The selected folder is not a Soulworker game client folder.

data.name: exception_folder_same_path_game
data.value: The program is in the same or in a sub folder as your game client. This will cause malfunctions or data corruption on your game client. Please move the patcher in another location or continue at your own risk.

data.name: exception_not_login_option
data.value: Direct login option is not active.

data.name: exception_not_tos
data.value: To play the game you need to accept the Terms of Service.

data.name: exception_read_translation_ini
data.value: Error reading translation version, try to Menu -> Force Patch

data.name: exception_validation_failed
data.value: Validation failed. Maybe your IP/Region is blocked?

data.name: notice_outdated_translation
data.value: Outdated translation files, force patching will now commence.

data.name: notice_pending_restart
data.value: Some changings will only be applied after restarting the application.

data.name: question_backup_files_found
data.value: Backup files found. Do you want to restore them now back in your client? Existing ones from your client will be swapped to the {0} translation. Selecting No will remove those backup files.

data.name: question_folder_same_path_game
data.value: The program is in the same or in a sub folder as your game client. This will cause malfunctions or data corruption on your game client. Are you sure you want to set to this folder?

data.name: success_log_file_upload
data.value: Log file was uploaded to "{0}" The link was copied to clipboard.

data.name: exception_rtpatch_result
data.value: Unknown error occured while updating Soulworker, best known way to fix at this moment is a complete reinstall of Soulworker. Code=[{0}] "{1}" was uploaded for improving the patcher in the future.

data.name: exception_captcha_validation
data.value: Too many invalid logins. You must login and complete the captcha on Hange website.

data.name: exception_server_refused_connection
data.value: Server has refused the connection. (server maintenance?)

data.name: exception_game_already_open
data.value: Cannot proceed because {0} is already running.

data.name: exception_rtpatch_not_exist_directory
data.value: Directory does not exist, check that the game directory is set properly.

data.name: exception_rtpatch_rename_fail
data.value: Failed to rename file. Try again.

data.name: exception_empty_id
data.value: ID cannot be empty, please set up your Soulworker ID or uncheck the login option.

data.name: exception_empty_pw
data.value: Password cannot be empty, please set up your Soulworker Password or uncheck the login option.

data.name: exception_rtpatch_administrator_required
data.value: Failed to update because the file requires administrative rights. Maybe the file is already in use? Try again.

data.name: exception_rtpatch_insufficient_storage
data.value: Failed to update because there isn't enough storage space on the drive.

data.name: exception_rtpatch_open_patch_file_fail
data.value: Failed to open patch file. Try again.

data.name: exception_rtpatch_time_date_fail
data.value: Failed to set the file's time/date stamp. Try again.

data.name: error_exe_patch_fail
data.value: .exe patch was not applied due to "{0}" not having been updated for the new client after a recent update. The client patch has been disabled. The game can still operate, except some texts will not be shown. Please try again later when "{0}" is implemented.

data.name: exception_rtpatch_read_patch_file_fail
data.value: Failed to read patch file. Try again.

data.name: exception_directory_rights
data.value: Unable to set the right permissions to the game folder "{0}".

data.name: exception_rtpatch_error_open_patch_file
data.value: Error in opening patch file. Try Again.

data.name: error_exe_region_not_supported
data.value: Your Soulworker region does not support .exe patching. The client patch has been disabled. The game can still operate, except some texts will not be shown.

data.name: exception_login_option_not_supported
data.value: Your Soulworker region does not support direct login. The login option was disabled.

data.name: exception_game_not_latest
data.value: Soulworker is not updated to the latest version. Try again after updating soulworker.

data.name: exception_game_stove_maintenance
exception_account_not_validated
data.value: Your soulworker account is not verified. Please verify your account on the website.

data.name: exception_account_to_be_deleted
data.value: This account is pending for deletion, if you want to cancel this, contact the customer support.

data.name: exception_captcha_required
data.value: Cannot login using patcher because your login requires to fill a captcha.

data.name: exception_follow_instruction_webpage
data.value: An error occured during login, follow the instructions on the webpage.
